alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dallam County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1021 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Texline, or 16 miles southeast of Clayton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texline and Ware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
